column4: hey, how do i mount an sd card plugged into a built-in reader?
Well, if it doesn't automatically mount when you insert the card, you might want to check fdisk to see if it's detected.
how do i go about doing that? dmesg reports "tifm_core: SmartMedia/xD card detected in socket 0:0"
Go into a terminal. Type: sudo fdisk -l
and if it doesn't show up?
Then you might consider getting an external reader :p
